TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ImapCapabilities extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Capabilities supported by an IMAP server.
Docs.remarks: Capabilities are read as part of the response to the CAPABILITY command that is issued during the connection and authentication phases of the .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Imap.ImapCapabilities Binary = int64(2048)

Docs.summary: The server supports the BINARY content extension defined in rfc3516.
